lines.text: Yes mama, what is it now?
You musn't forget your mother, Ivan!

[singing]
Oh, you dear boy, Ivan. Come to meet me at the gate! I got a brand-new sarafan, all of silk and lace it's made!

[singing]
Vania, Vania, wait a bit, where have you been to? Don't pass by, we must meet. Look into my window!

[singing]
Please, Ivan, don't leave forever, on the porch we'll sit together. Of an apple, take a bite, we'll be talking, side by side.
